TopicTitle: Online KSP 2 Save Viewer - Updated to support KSP 2 version 0.2.0

Articles.Content:
This is a web-based save viewer (and in the future editor). You can use it to view lots of info about your save file, including vessels, your travel log, and more.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Due to breaking changes in the save file format introduced in version 0.2.0, older save files may no longer be compatible with the site, please open the save file in 0.2.0 and save it again if you experience any issues.

Links

The live version is available here: https://ksp-2-save-viewer.likesdinosaurs.com/

And the source code is available here: https://github.com/Rodentman87/ksp-2-save-viewer

Feel free to make contributions, but for any major changes, please make an issue to discuss it before spending too much time working on it.

License

MIT

Plans for the future:

- Save editing, including moving ships into orbit around other bodies

- Live data once the web server mod is released and a bit farther along

Edited December 20, 2023 by Rodentman87
mark as updated to 0.2.0 and include compatiblity note
Oh this is very nice! Thanks!
For those following the thread for updates, the save viewer is now updated to support save files from version 0.2.0!
